Room.Name: Secret Underground Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a secret underground passage.
Room.LongDescription: You assume you're somewhere under the city of Hafnia. The torches have all burned out. You have reached a dead-end in the passage. The passage continues to the northeast. You notice that the floor is rather slick. It has been covered with moss and mildew so much so that the floor just looks green.
